skills.name: Sawblade Tuning
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Molten Detonation
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Himeko's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Heavenly Flare
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Himeko's ATK to all enemies. Himeko regenerates <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> extra Energy for each enemy defeated.

skills.name: Victory Rush
skills.desc: When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge (max <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> points).\nIf Himeko is fully Charged when an ally performs an attack, Himeko immediately performs 1 <u>follow-up attack</u> and deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of her ATK to all enemies, consuming all Charge points.\nAt the start of the battle, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge.

skills.name: Incomplete Combustion
skills.desc: After using Technique, creates a dimension that lasts for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> second(s). After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to increase Fire DMG taken by enemies by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

eidolons.name: Childhood
eidolons.desc: After "Victory Rush" is triggered, Himeko's SPD increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

eidolons.name: Convergence
eidolons.desc: Deals <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> more DMG to enemies whose HP percentage is <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> or less.

eidolons.name: Poised
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Dedication
eidolons.desc: When Himeko's Skill inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, she gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> extra point(s) of Charge.

eidolons.name: Aspiration
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Trailblaze!
eidolons.desc: Ultimate deals DMG 2 extra times, each of which deals Fire DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the original DMG to a random enemy.

skillTree.name: Starfire
skillTree.desc: After using an attack, there is a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> base chance to inflict Burn on enemies for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).\nWhen afflicted with Burn, enemies take Fire DoT equal to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of Himeko's ATK at the start of each turn.

skillTree.name: Magma
skillTree.desc: Skill deals <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> more DMG to enemies currently afflicted with Burn.

skillTree.name: Benchmark
skillTree.desc: When current HP percentage is <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> or higher, CRIT Rate increases by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.
